verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* behalf \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hardships \w he|strong="H3068"\w* endured,

how \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Mighty \w One|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*:

“\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w enter|strong="H5927"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w or|strong="H1004"\w* \w get|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w bed|strong="H3326"\w*,

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8153"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* or \w slumber|strong="H8572"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w*,

\w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H4908"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Mighty \w One|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.\f + \fr 132:5 \ft LXX for the God of Jacob; see Acts 7:46.\f*”

\w We|strong="H8085"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* ark \w was|strong="H7704"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Ephrathah;\f + \fr 132:6 \ft Literally Behold, we heard of it in Ephrathah\f* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w it|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w Jaar|strong="H3293"\w*.

Let us \w go|strong="H7272"\w* \w to|strong="H7272"\w* \w His|strong="H7812"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H4908"\w* \w place|strong="H4908"\w*; let us \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w at|strong="H4908"\w* \w His|strong="H7812"\w* \w footstool|strong="H1916"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w resting|strong="H4496"\w* \w place|strong="H4496"\w*, \w You|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3548"\w* Your \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Your \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* \w shout|strong="H7442"\w* \w for|strong="H7442"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sake|strong="H5668"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w do|strong="H4899"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w reject|strong="H7725"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* one.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w promise|strong="H7650"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w revoke|strong="H7725"\w*: “\w One|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* descendants \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H7896"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*.\f + \fr 132:11 \ft Literally “From the fruit of your body I will set (one) on your throne. Cited in Acts 2:30\f*

\w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5713"\w* \w I|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* \w them|strong="H3925"\w*, \w then|strong="H1571"\w* \w their|strong="H3925"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w forever|strong="H5703"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.”

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* chosen \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* desired \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H3068"\w*:

“\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3427"\w* \w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w resting|strong="H4496"\w* \w place|strong="H4496"\w* \w forever|strong="H5703"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*; \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* desired \w this|strong="H2063"\w* home.

\w I|strong="H1288"\w* will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w her|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* abundant \w provisions|strong="H6718"\w*; \w I|strong="H1288"\w* will \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* \w her|strong="H7646"\w* poor \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

I \w will|strong="H2623"\w* \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w her|strong="H3847"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w her|strong="H3847"\w* \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* \w will|strong="H2623"\w* \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* \w out|strong="H7442"\w* \w in|strong="H3847"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H6779"\w* \w will|strong="H8033"\w* \w make|strong="H6779"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w grow|strong="H6779"\w* \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; \w I|strong="H6779"\w* \w have|strong="H1732"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6186"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w My|strong="H1732"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* one.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* will \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* enemies \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*, \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* will gleam.”
